subject: Re: Phonak launch - items to be added to Phonak Digital marketing catalogue

full_threads.body: Fantastic, thanks 😊
@rica, thanks for the detailed time tracking. Revised times have been updated on the Momentum tracker, ticket is closed.

Hi Melinda, 

Great news, the updates are now live.
@chris done pushing the changes to live.
@rica all clear for GO_LIVE!

Hi Chris,

This looks fine.

Please make the site live.

Regards,

Melinda

Hi Melinda, 

Thanks, confirming the most recent round of updates have been completed: https://stg-phonakmarketing-stg.kinsta.cloud/marketing-catalogue/

We're standing by for the push to live.

@chris all done - https://stg-phonakmarketing-stg.kinsta.cloud/marketing-catalogue/

Let me know if we can push it to live.
Hi @rica, Melinda has added assets to the share folder. Are you ok to tackle these updates?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Chris,

Thanks for updating.

A few more items to update.

Can you please add the order forms for each of the following in the 'Professional brochures' section of the appropriate tile:

Terra+

Naida Lumity

Sky Lumity

Order forms are saved in each of the OneDrive folders.

In the Terra+ tile can you please remove the duplicated tab for consumer brochure:



Thanks,

Mel.

@chris here's the summary of our time spent in this task:
Manuel - 1H for uploading the 4 product images file
Glen - a total of 1H for revisions and follow up task
Rika - 1H for all the back and forth follow up tasks.

Hi Melinda, 

Great news, the image uploads are complete and linked to the corresponding sections.

Hi Melinda, 

Thanks, confirming the outstanding tasks have been completed except for the image uploads for: 
  • Audeo L 
  • Naida L-SP
  • Sky L-SP & L-M
  • Terra +
These files require a server-side upload due to their size. The upload has been running for most of the afternoon and is due to finish in the next hour or so. We'll let you know once this is finished. 

In the meantime, can you please check the other items in prep for the go-live: https://stg-phonakmarketing-stg.kinsta.cloud/marketing-catalogue/
@chris done making the updates however I need @glen help in uploading the zip file for product images.

hi @rica, here is the Google Sheet: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1juTg8T2Z-JKOFjGFeQ83iPX1dp1fC5JrDHKPd_UNgf0/edit?usp=sharing

Tasks are noted in column Chris notes. Any questions, please let me know.
@chris @glen I was the one who completed the tasks except for the Taget Software as Glen completed it. Please check my notes here in the attached file.

attachments.filename: Phonak Digital marketing catalogue amendments S1 2024 EDITS TO PAGES.xlsm

full_threads.body:

2. Audeo L Order Form - updated

8. Updated the image tile for Phonak Terra Pamphlet
9. No product images on the onedrive
10. Done renaming the target software tile.

40mins

action.text: Glen Tenorio assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi Melinda, 

Thanks for sharing, the tasks are with our dev team now and we'll be looping back ASAP.
@rica, are you ok to perform these updates?

Hi Chris,

Thanks for this.

Please see attached updated spreadsheet with a column 'Wolf edits' I have made a few notes of items missing or images that are not showing correctly.

Can these please be updated. I have also added product images to each of the file and noted this on the spreadsheet. Can these also please be added per product.

Thanks,

M.

full_threads.body: +15 mins addtional time added to the Momentum Tracker.

Hi Melinda, Hi Eric, 

Confirming the changes have been made including the images for promo items and catalogue tile supplied by Melinda. Here is the link: https://stg-phonakmarketing-stg.kinsta.cloud/marketing-catalogue/
